text: Nicéphore Dieudonné Soglo (born November 29, 1934) is a Beninese politician. He was Prime Minister of Benin from 1990 to 1991 and President from 1991 to 1996. He was Mayor of Cotonou from 2003 to 2015. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Benin Category:Prime ministers of Benin
title: Nicéphore Soglo
